factual.text: Which countries or regions were mentioned as receiving UK humanitarian aid in the debates?
What specific funding amounts (in pounds) were announced for humanitarian assistance, and on what dates?
Which ministers or government departments were mentioned as responsible for managing the response to the Sudan crisis?
What dates were mentioned regarding decisions to resume or suspend funding to UNRWA?

conceptual.text: How do speakers justify humanitarian intervention: moral duty, international law, or national interest?
What arguments are made about balancing border control with humanitarian obligations to refugees and asylum seekers?
How do speakers frame the relationship between economic stability and national security in the debates?
What recurring themes appear when speakers discuss the effectiveness of international organizations (UN, WFP, NGOs) in crisis response?
